snippet: The new Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank attracted 46 founding members, among them 14 advanced economies of the Group of 20, including Brazil, France, Germany and Russia.
abstract: New Analysis; China announces that it has attracted 46 founding members, including 14 advanced economies from Group of 20, for its Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank; support was unexpected even by China.
lead_paragraph: The new Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank attracted 46 founding members, among them 14 advanced economies of the Group of 20, including Brazil, France, Germany and Russia.

headline.print_headline: Rush to Join China’s New Asian Bank Surprises All, Even the Chinese
headline.main: Stampede to Join China’s Development Bank Stuns Even Its Founder
